Refinement: What specific criteria determine the split between Air Freight and Cargo Ship logistics and how are trade-offs between transportation costs and inventory holding costs evaluated for High-Demand versus Other markets? Refinement: Regarding the exclusive gateway for quality checks what thresholds define the boundary between Rework and Scrap and how does the potential bottleneck of rework loops affect the throughput time of the 247 assembly operation?
